original_text: And everything on which she lies during her menstrual impurity shall be unclean. Everything also on which she sits shall be unclean.
korean_text: 그가 불결할 동안에는 그가 누웠던 자리도 다 부정하며 그가 앉았던 자리도 다 부정한즉

sentences.original_text: And everything on which she lies
during her menstrual impurity shall be unclean.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 월경 부정 기간 동안 부정할 것이니라.

sentences.original_text: Everything also on which she sits
